title: Is AI the End of the Shark Tank as We Know It? How Artificial Intelligence is Revolutionizing Capital Raising
description: In 2023, artificial intelligence (AI) is experiencing an unprecedented surge in popularity and utility across various industries. While AI’s advancements have been widely acknowledged in areas such as natural language processing and autonomous vehicles, there is a lesser-known but transformative use case emerging – AI’s role in revolutionizing capital raising. Traditional methods of securing funding, ... Read more

title: Cathie Wood Warns of Economic Hard Landing but Pins Hope on AI for Rescue
description: Cathie Wood, the founder of Ark Invest, manages approximately $12 billion in assets through her exchange-traded funds (ETFs). With a keen eye on macroeconomic trends and major technological disruptions, Wood recently shared her concerns and optimism during an interview at the Forbes/SHOOK Top Advisor Summit in Las Vegas. She expressed worries about a hard landing ... Read more

title: Hackers return stolen funds after being identified by HTX
description: On Sept. 24, HTX's hot wallet suffered a cyberattack that saw 5,000 ETH, equivalent to $8 million, stolen by hackers.

title: Ethereum 2.0 upgrade has brought more centralization to the blockchain
description: JPMorgan's researchers suggest that the surge in staking activity comes at a cost: centralization.

title: Cardano’s 2024 Vision: Continuing 2023’s Development Success
description:
2023 has been a big year of development for Cardano (ADA), and one of Charles Hoskinson’s latest X posts suggests its developers will be keeping their heads down in 2024 as well. According to the post, “2024 will be the Mithril age of Cardano”. Hoskinson also shared his expectations for what Mithril’s status will be […]

The post Cardano’s 2024 Vision: Continuing 2023’s Development Success appeared first on Coin Edition.
